siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Resquared is a web app that has data on every local business and makes it easy to reach out to them with built-in marketing tools. If you were trying to sell to restaurants, you’d open Resquared, create a search, and have access to thousands of restaurants.
blogPost.body: Resquared is a web app that has data on every local business and makes it easy to reach out to them with built-in marketing tools. If you were trying to sell to restaurants, you’d open Resquared, create a search, and have access to thousands of restaurants.
blogPost.title: Resquared - Marketing software for reaching local businesses.
blogPost.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Resquared是一款网络应用，它拥有当地每家企业的数据，并通过内置的营销工具让你轻松接触到他们。如果你想向餐馆销售，你会打开Resquared，创建一个搜索，并可以访问成千上万的餐馆。
localize.tagline: 覆盖本地企业的营销软件。

localize.description: Resquared是一款網絡應用，它擁有當地每家企業的數據，並通過內置的營銷工具讓你輕鬆接觸到他們。如果你想向餐館銷售，你會打開Resquared，創建一個搜索，並可以訪問成千上萬的餐館。
localize.tagline: 覆蓋本地企業的營銷軟件。

previous.excerpt: Between payments, user info, chat, live conferencing, email & SMS, you’re racking up over 12 different apps every time you hold a live online class. With Classtra, you can build your own branded live learning platform to take care of it all in one place.
previous.title: Classtra 3.0 - Create your own live learning platform

localize.description: 在支付、用户信息、聊天、实时会议、电子邮件和短信之间，每次举办在线直播课时，你都会积累超过12个不同的应用程序。有了Classtra，你可以建立自己的品牌直播学习平台，在一个地方就能搞定这一切。
localize.tagline: 创建自己的直播学习平台

localize.description: 在支付、用戶信息、聊天、實時會議、電子郵件和短信之間，每次舉辦在線直播課時，你都會積累超過12個不同的應用程序。有了Classtra，你可以建立自己的品牌直播學習平臺，在一個地方就能搞定這一切。
localize.tagline: 創建自己的直播學習平臺

next.excerpt: DataTorch is a platform for building datasets and experimenting with machine learning algorithms. Organize and annotate data across multiple cloud storages, automate tasks with agents and pipelines, and share your models and data with the wider community!
next.title: DataTorch - Build and share datasets to experiment with ML

localize.description: DataTorch是一个用于构建数据集和实验机器学习算法的平台。在多个云存储中组织和注释数据，利用代理和管道自动执行任务，并与更广泛的社区分享您的模型和数据！您可以在云存储中组织和注释数据，利用代理和管道自动执行任务，并与更广泛的社区分享您的模型和数据。
localize.tagline: 建立和共享数据集，以实验ML。

localize.description: DataTorch是一個用於構建數據集和實驗機器學習算法的平臺。在多個雲存儲中組織和註釋數據，利用代理和管道自動執行任務，並與更廣泛的社區分享您的模型和數據！您可以在雲存儲中組織和註釋數據，利用代理和管道自動執行任務，並與更廣泛的社區分享您的模型和數據。
localize.tagline: 建立和共享數據集，以實驗ML。
